mission.name: Broken Arm
mission.missionText: Help, I fell off my bike and I think my arm is broken!

mission.name: Walking Dead
mission.missionText: Patient was hit by car and could possible be walking dead.

mission.name: What is happening to me
mission.missionText: I woke up feeling sick and puked up blood!

mission.name: The aliens are here to take me away!!
mission.missionText: Patient called saying there was aliens coming after her.

mission.name: I dont feel too good
mission.missionText: Patient called saying they keep being sick since eating chicken in the morning.

mission.name: Where am I
mission.missionText: Concerned citizen called stating elderly lady is wandering round at night lost.

mission.name: Train Sandwich.
mission.missionText: Citizen calls stating patient was got leg stuck in gap between train and platform.

mission.name: Head on Collision
mission.missionText: Patient has had head on collision with lorry and is unresponsive.
